meanings.definition: Add color to (a black and white photograph)
meanings.sent1: She colorised the old photograph of her grandparents.
meanings.sent2: The artist colorised the black and white painting to make it more vibrant.
meanings.sent3: The cat accidentally colorised its fur by rolling in paint.
meanings.sent4: His laughter colorised the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The rainbow colorised the sky after the storm passed.

meanings.sent4: Her words colorised his world with hope and happiness.
meanings.sent5: The sunset colorised the horizon with hues of orange and purple.
